Huan said.
"A bowl of clove decoction.
The man then made a gesture of vomiting.
Huan said.
'Affection becomes affliction.'
Huan then prepared some medicine for him.
The gong said.
"There's a thief!
Huan put down the medicine in front of the duke.
He stood with his arms folded to his side.
He stared at him with open eyes and said.
"He's a young woodsman.
Huan wiped his sleeve and walked out.
Another day, he asked.
"There are four major groups of people who are about to get separated.
How can the great master save them?
Huan then beat his chest three times.
The master said.
"We're lucky to meet a writer.
Huan said.
'I've been studying the Buddhist teachings for years.
I still haven't gotten rid of the worldly temperament.
The gong said.
"Misfortune doesn't come singly.
Huan made a booing sound.
The minister wrote a verse and left it with Captain Li, saying.
"The bubble that arises and the bubble that ceases are originally the same.
The two dharmas are originally the same.
If he wants to know where they really belong, he'll write a verse to Lieutenant Li.
It's west of the east courtyard of Zhaozhou.
The captain saw it.
He then said.
"They're selling paper money at the Taishan temple.
The lieutenant arrived.
He had already passed away.
